
                            
                            <p> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/01/135548n1sjxb6052apabis.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202502/01/135548n1sjxb6052apabis.jpg"> <br>  <br>  <br> 我觉得挺好喝的还，入口回味都挺甜的苦味不大，当然五粮液更甜，同价位我觉得还行，京东好像300左右一箱6瓶价格还行，谁喝过  <br> </p><p class="pl">看着就不咋地</p><p></p>
